attributes.action: TENANTS V OWNERS  LAWS NEED CHANGING  ANTI TENANT AT THE MOMENT?
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT A `LEVEL PLAYING FIELD` FOR TENANTS WHO HAVE COMPLAINTS FROM OWNERS THROUGH HOUSING ASSOCIATIONS WITH NO `REVERSE COMPLAINT SYSTEM FOR TENANTS`, THE WHOLE SYSTEM IS VERY UNBALANCED AS FOLLOWS: OWNERS CAN AND DO MAKE COMPLAINTS WITH THE TENANTS HAVING TO REMOVE ITEMS FROM THERE REAR GARDENS LIKE SHEDS,GREENHOUSES,WENDY HOUSES, LARGE SHRUBS AND PLAY THINGS LIKE A TRAMPOLINE, BUT THE TENANT CAN NOT DO THE SAME AS ASSOCIATIONS HAVE NO CONTROL OVER OWNERS, ALSO THE ABOVE DOES NOT BREACH PLANNING IN A PRIVATE PROPERTY, THIS IS VERY WRONG AS IT HITS ONLY THE TENANTS WHICH SHOULD NOT HAPPEN IN A WESTERN COUNTRY, TENANTS HAVE LESS MONEY THAN OWNERS AND NEED A BALANCED LEGAL SYSTEM, HUMAN RIGHTS NOT SURE ON THIS.
